segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures everyday life gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet on, sink full, overflow starting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water ruining the cabinets, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the water, she doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning to the left, open cabinet with cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbing the stool, hand inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate too, clever but naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl beside him, palm open expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing cookies behind mom's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden through the window is serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's chaos she doesn't see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe this is happening unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR
